content.text: Nothing much, just working on the latest episode of my show.
Oh cool, what show do you work on?
It's a cartoon about a group of friends who go on adventures.
That sounds fun! What's your favorite episode so far?
I think my favorite episode is the one where they go to the beach.
That sounds like a fun episode. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to play basketball, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun. What do you want to do after college?
I want to be a famous animator and work for a big company like dreamworks.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll achieve it.
